name: Random Lotto Number Chooser
tagline: This random lotto number chooser will automatically pick 6 random numbers for you, and they will rarely be the same.
body:
# Random Lotto Number Chooser

This random lotto number chooser will automatically pick 6 random numbers for you, and they will rarely be the same! Then you can reset in and generate another random 6 numbers.

![Screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/willtheorangeguy/Random-Lotto-Number-Chooser/master/Screenshot2.PNG)

## Features
* Generates 6 random numbers
* The 6 numbers are rarely the same
* Allows you to reset the numbers

## Purpose
The purpose of this program was to be a test for working in Python, but is now a great way for anyone looking to find 6 or any number of lucky numbers when they need it from their desktop computer.

## Contributors
* @willtheorangeguy
* Special Thanks to Mike McGrath for the idea

## Instillation
If you have any problems installing the software, please contact us over at the [Issues page](https://github.com/willtheorangeguy/Random-Lotto-Number-Chooser/issues).

### Through the Python Module
* Download the Python module if you havenâ€™t already: [Download Link](https://www.python.org/ftp/python/3.5.2/python-3.5.2.exe), and install it,
* Extract files from your GitHub Download,
* Double click the lotto.py file in File Explorer,
* And the app will open for you to use!

### Creating an Executable File Through cx_Freeze
* Download cx_Freeze if you havenâ€™t already: [Download Link](https://pypi.python.org/packages/b7/64/2e8bbd862e72253d0aee6e69a30e06af1baa11bcc96c1ffb2a4303fb6b23/cx_Freeze-4.3.4.win32-py3.4.exe#md5=bd087416c69ced533768a22e5d3414b8), and install it,
* Extract the files from your GitHub download to this location on your computer: C:\Users\YOUR_USERNAME,
* Open Command Prompt and type the following command:
```
python setup.py bdist_msi
```
* Run the .msi file that the process creates in a dist sub-directory to create an executable,
* Run the executable and the app will open for you to use!

## Use Instructions
* Click the 'Get My Lucky Numbers' button in the bottom left hand corner of the app.

![Screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/willtheorangeguy/Random-Lotto-Number-Chooser/master/Screenshot2.PNG)

* The app will then generate 6 random numbers to replace the '...' in the top 6 squares. 

![Screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/willtheorangeguy/Random-Lotto-Number-Chooser/master/Screenshot.PNG)

* Click the reset button in the bottom right corer to get new numbers.

## Releases
The most recent stable release is version 1.6. Version 1.6 added:
* Update README
* New website

The next release, version 1.7 or 2.0 is coming out soon with new bug fixes and features. Here are some bellow: 
* Number amount control (Ability to choose 1 to 10 numbers, or more.)
* Number value limit (Ability to choose how high the number value are.)

Sending in a [pull request](https://github.com/willtheorangeguy/Random-Lotto-Number-Chooser/pulls) for new features you want to implement and bugs you want to help fix are always welcome. Creating a [new issue](https://github.com/willtheorangeguy/Random-Lotto-Number-Chooser/issues) for a new feature is welcome too. Look to see your contributions in future updates.

## Bugs and Issues
Who likes bugs in their software? (We donâ€™t think anybody does! ðŸ˜‰) Thatâ€™s why we try hard to make sure that there are no bugs in our software, but sometimes a few slip through the system. If you have found any, feel free to let us know on the [Issues page](https://github.com/willtheorangeguy/Random-Lotto-Number-Chooser/issues)! We will try to have these issues fixed as soon as possible. 

** Note:** Please check the known issues list below before posting an issue to see if your issue is already on the list!
* No currently known issues. Submit one!

You can view the license in the [LICENSE.md](https://github.com/willtheorangeguy/Random-Lotto-Number-Chooser/blob/master/LICENSE.md) file in this projects repository.
By using this software, you agree to this license. Please adhere to this license when using, distributing, and making changes to the software.

## Other Links
Visit these other links to learn more about Random Lotto Number Chooser.

The [Latest Version Download](https://github.com/willtheorangeguy/Random-Lotto-Number-Chooser/archive/v1.5.zip), [Issues page](https://github.com/willtheorangeguy/Random-Lotto-Number-Chooser/issues), [Pull Requests page](https://github.com/willtheorangeguy/Random-Lotto-Number-Chooser/pulls), [Wiki](https://github.com/willtheorangeguy/Random-Lotto-Number-Chooser/wiki), and [Documentation](https://github.com/willtheorangeguy/Random-Lotto-Number-Chooser/blob/master/README.md).
